item.title: MicrosoftTeamsPowerShell
item.description: Get all owners of all teams and team channels 1# Documentation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/teams/?view=teams-ps 2 3# Run the following command to install the latest PowerShellGet: 4Install-Module -Name PowerShellGet -Force -AllowClobber 5 6# Install the Teams PowerShell Module. 7Install-Module -Name MicrosoftTeams -Force -AllowClobber 8 9# To start working with Microsoft Teams PowerShell module, sign in with your Azure credentials. 10Connect-MicrosoftTeams 11 12$teams = Get-Team | Select-Object DisplayName,GroupId 13 14$teamOwners=@() 15 16$teamChannelOwners=@() 17 18$teamOwners = foreach ($team in $teams) { 19 20 $groupId = $team.
